docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Three mental-health experts who have recommended denying custody to Baby M's biological mother, Mary Beth Whitehead, contended today that Mrs. Whitehead exhibited signs of emotional instability and should be denied access to the girl for at least five years.

headline.main: THREE EXPERTS SAY BABY M'S MOTHER IS UNSTABLE
